content: I don't have access to the latest news and events. however, the fda is constantly monitoring food and drug products and addressing any safety concerns that arise. in recent years, the fda has taken action on a variety of issues, including recalls of contaminated food products, warnings about potential health risks associated with certain drugs, and efforts to limit the availability of electronic cigarettes to minors. one example is the fda's recent recall of certain brands of hand sanitizers due to potential contamination with methanol, which can be toxic when absorbed through the skin or ingested. the fda continually works to protect the health and safety of the public by addressing any potential risks that arise with food and drug products.
